description: Pair the natural numbers such that the n-th pair is (k, k+p(n)) where k is the smallest number not occurring earlier and p(n) is the n-th prime. (1, 3), (2, 5), (4, 9), (6, 13), (7, 18), (8, 21), (10, 27), (11, 30), (12, 35), (14, 43), ... This is the sequence of the sum of the members of every pair.
